theme_info.title: The display name of the theme, shown in the theme selection menu.
theme_info.author: The name of the theme creator.
theme_info.authorUrl: A link to the author's profile or website, often a Reddit, GitHub, or personal URL (must be safe for work).
theme_info.description: A brief description of the theme, such as its inspiration, features, or style.

themeCover: Path to the theme preview thumbnail image (required, typically 'cover.png', used as a cover or thumbnail for theme selection in the settings menu). Image size: Matches device resolution or square preview, PNG format with transparency support.
desktopWallpaper: Path to the desktop background image (e.g., 'desk_bg001.png', used as the home screen wallpaper). Image size: 320x240px, PNG format.
globalWallpaper: Path to the global background image (e.g., 'global_bg001.png', applied across various screens). Image size: 320x240px, PNG format.
desktopMask: Path to the desktop overlay mask image (optional, e.g., 'mask.png', for effects like frames, vignetting, border decorations, or screen texture overlays on the home screen). Use empty string for none. Image size: 320x240px, PNG with transparency.
fontFamily: Path to a custom font file (optional, e.g., 'customfont.ttf', applied globally to override system font). Supported formats: .ttf (TrueType Font). Place font file in theme directory root. Must have appropriate character set for the language.

itemConfig.itemTextColor: Hex color for unselected list item text (e.g., '#ffffff' for white). Format: '#RRGGBB' or '#AARRGGBB' for alpha.
itemConfig.itemSelectedTextColor: Hex color for selected list item text (e.g., '#ffffff').
itemConfig.itemBackground: Path to unselected list item background image (use empty string for default). Image size: 640x91px, PNG.
itemConfig.itemSelectedBackground: Path to selected list item background image (e.g., '1.png', used in music lists, file browsers). Image size: 640x91px, PNG.
itemConfig.itemRightArrow: Path to the right arrow indicator image for list items (e.g., '2.png', shown next to selectable items). Image size: Small icon, PNG with transparency.

dialogConfig.dialogOptionBackground: Path to dialog option background image (e.g., '3.png'). Image size: Matches dialog elements, PNG.
dialogConfig.dialogOptionTextColor: Hex color for dialog option text (e.g., '#ffffff').
dialogConfig.dialogOptionSelectedBackground: Path to selected dialog option background image (e.g., '4.png'). Image size: Matches dialog elements, PNG.
dialogConfig.dialogOptionSelectedTextColor: Hex color for selected dialog option text (e.g., '#ffffff').
dialogConfig.dialogBackgroundColor: Hex color for overall dialog background (e.g., '#000000').
dialogConfig.dialogTextColor: Hex color for general dialog text (e.g., '#ffffff').

menuConfig.menuBackgroundColor: Hex color for menu background (e.g., '#000000' for black).
menuConfig.menuItemBackground: Path to unselected menu item background image (use empty string for default).
menuConfig.menuItemTextColor: Hex color for unselected menu item text (e.g., '#ffffff').
menuConfig.menuItemSelectedBackground: Path to selected menu item background image (e.g., '1.png').
menuConfig.menuItemSelectedTextColor: Hex color for selected menu item text (e.g., '#ffffff').

homePageConfig.selectedColor: Hex color for selected main menu items (optional, e.g., '#FF6B6B').
homePageConfig.unselectedColor: Hex color for unselected main menu items (optional, e.g., '#4ECDC4').
homePageConfig.nowPlaying: Path to 'Now Playing' main menu icon (e.g., 'Now Playing.png', leads to current playback screen). Image size: 166x166px, PNG with transparency.
homePageConfig.music: Path to 'Music' main menu icon (e.g., 'Music.png', accesses music library). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.video: Path to 'Videos' main menu icon (e.g., 'Videos.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.audiobooks: Path to 'Audiobooks' main menu icon (e.g., 'Audiobooks.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.photos: Path to 'Photos' main menu icon (e.g., 'Photos.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.fm: Path to 'FM Radio' main menu icon (e.g., 'FM Radio.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.bluetooth: Path to 'Bluetooth' main menu icon (e.g., 'Bluetooth.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.settings: Path to 'Settings' main menu icon (e.g., 'Settings.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.shuffleQuick: Path to 'Shuffle Quick' main menu icon (e.g., 'Shuffle Quick.png', for quick shuffle playback). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.ebook: Path to 'E-book' main menu icon (e.g., 'ebook.png', for e-book reader). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.calculator: Path to 'Calculator' main menu icon (e.g., 'calculator.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.
homePageConfig.calendar: Path to 'Calendar' main menu icon (e.g., 'calendar.png'). Image size: 166x166px, PNG.

fileConfig.folderIcon: Path to folder icon in file browser (e.g., 'folder.png', use empty string for default). Image size: Small icon, PNG.
fileConfig.musicIcon: Path to music file icon in file browser (e.g., 'music_file.png', use empty string for default). Image size: Small icon, PNG.

settingConfig.selectedColor: Hex color for selected settings items (optional, e.g., '#FF6B6B').
settingConfig.unselectedColor: Hex color for unselected settings items (optional, e.g., '#4ECDC4').
settingConfig.settingMask: Path to settings screen overlay mask image (e.g., 'settings_mask.png', for effects on settings page). Image size: 320x240px, PNG with transparency.
settingConfig.shutdown: Path to 'Shutdown' settings icon (e.g., 'Shutdown@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_off: Path to 'Timed Shutdown Off' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_001@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_10: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 10min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_002@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_20: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 20min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_003@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_30: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 30min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_004@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_60: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 60min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_005@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_90: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 90min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_006@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.timedShutdown_120: Path to 'Timed Shutdown 120min' icon (e.g., 'Timed shutdown_007@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

settingConfig.shuffleOff: Path to 'Shuffle Off' icon (e.g., 'Shuffle_off@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

settingConfig.equalizer_rock: Path to 'Equalizer Rock' icon (e.g., 'Equalizer_rock@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

settingConfig.keyLockOff: Path to 'Key Lock Off' icon (e.g., 'Key lock_off@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

settingConfig.keyVibrationOff: Path to 'Key Vibration Off' icon (e.g., 'Key vibration_off@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.wallpaper: Path to 'Wallpaper' settings icon (e.g., 'Wallpaper@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.backlight_10: Path to 'Backlight 10s' icon (e.g., 'Backlight_001@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.backlight_15: Path to 'Backlight 15s' icon (e.g., 'Backlight_003@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

settingConfig.brightness: Path to 'Brightness' settings icon (e.g., 'Brightness@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.displayBatteryOn: Path to 'Display Battery On' icon (e.g., 'Display battery_on@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.displayBatteryOff: Path to 'Display Battery Off' icon (e.g., 'Display battery_off@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.dateTime: Path to 'Date & Time' settings icon (e.g., 'Date & Time@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.language: Path to 'Language' settings icon (e.g., 'Language@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.launcher: Path to 'Launcher/Rockbox' toggle settings icon (e.g., 'Launcher.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.factoryReset: Path to 'Factory Reset' icon (e.g., 'Factory@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.clearCache: Path to 'Clear Cache' icon (e.g., 'Clear cache@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.theme: Path to 'Change Theme' icon (e.g., 'Change Theme@1x.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.fileExtensionOn: Path to 'File Extension On' icon (e.g., 'file_ext_on.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.
settingConfig.fileExtensionOff: Path to 'File Extension Off' icon (e.g., 'file_ext_off.png'). Image size: 146x146px, PNG.

statusConfig.playing: Path to music playing indicator icon (e.g., 'play.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.audiobookPlaying: Path to audiobook playing indicator icon (e.g., 'audiobook_play.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.pause: Path to paused indicator icon (e.g., 'pause.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.fmPlaying: Path to FM radio playing indicator icon (e.g., 'fm_play.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.stop: Path to stopped indicator icon (e.g., 'stop.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.blConnected: Path to Bluetooth connected icon (e.g., 'bl_connected.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.blConnecting: Path to Bluetooth connecting icon (e.g., 'bl_connecting.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.blDisconnected: Path to Bluetooth disconnected icon (e.g., 'bl_disconnected.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.headsetWithMic: Path to headset with microphone icon (e.g., 'headset_mic.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.headsetWithoutMic: Path to headset without microphone icon (e.g., 'headset_no_mic.png', use empty string for default). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
statusConfig.statusBarColor: Hex color for status bar background (e.g., '#000000', use empty string for default, controls top bar color or transparency).
statusConfig.battery: Array of 4 paths to battery level images (e.g., ['battery.001.png', 'battery.002.png', 'battery.003.png', 'battery.004.png'], for 0-25%, 26-50%, 51-75%, 76-100%). Image size: 64x64px each, PNG.
statusConfig.batteryCharging: Array of 4 paths to charging battery images (e.g., ['batterycharge.001.png', 'batterycharge.002.png', 'batterycharge.003.png', 'batterycharge.004.png'], for same levels during charging). Image size: 64x64px each, PNG.

playerConfig.progressTextColor: Hex color for time/progress text in media player (e.g., '#ffffff').
playerConfig.progressColor: Hex color for progress bar fill (e.g., '#00ff00').
playerConfig.progressBackgroundColor: Hex color for progress bar background (e.g., '#333333').

additional_ui_images.description: Additional UI element images not directly referenced in config.json but part of theme structure (replace with custom PNGs matching sizes).
additional_ui_images.4.png: Dialog option selected background. Image size: Matches dialog elements, PNG.
additional_ui_images.5.png: Dialog background. Image size: Matches dialog elements, PNG.
additional_ui_images.6.png: Progress bar background. Image size: Small bar, PNG.
additional_ui_images.7.png: Progress bar fill. Image size: Small bar, PNG.
additional_ui_images.8.png: Volume bar background. Image size: Small bar, PNG.
additional_ui_images.9.png: Volume bar fill. Image size: Small bar, PNG.
additional_ui_images.12.png: Signal strength background. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.13.png: Signal strength fill. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_0.png: Battery 0% icon (alternative to array). Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_1.png: Battery low icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_2.png: Battery medium-low icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_3.png: Battery medium icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_4.png: Battery medium-high icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.battery_5.png: Battery full icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.bluetooth_off.png: Bluetooth off icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.bluetooth_on.png: Bluetooth on icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.wifi_off.png: WiFi off icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
additional_ui_images.wifi_on.png: WiFi on icon. Image size: 64x64px, PNG.
